creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: canal with boats lining each side; houses along R side and in background; figures working on and around boats; three ducks swimming at center
inscription: Margin: [一九五一年作　浦安] {1951nen saku, Urayasu}; bottom, in grey: [Urayasu], in pencil: [Toshi Yoshida]
markings: LLC: Red artist\'s seal [吉田遠] {Yoshida Tō}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Urayasu
